alert.note: Alert for Eastern Montgomery; Lower Bucks; Philadelphia (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 3:24PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Montgomery, south central Bucks and northeastern Philadelphia Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 324 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wissinoming, or near Philadelphia, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Philadelphia, Bensalem, Palmyra, Hatboro, Jenkintown, Rockledge, Abington, Bryn Athyn, Wissinoming, Andalusia, Holmesburg, Northeast Philadelphia, Tacony, Willow Grove, Feasterville-Trevose, Cornwells Heights-Eddington, Wyncote, Warminster Heights and Glenside. This includes the following highways... Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 344 and 352. Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 26 and 37. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
